## Description {#details}

Add CF&#95;ALU.

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/r600">R600</a> Alu instructions are grouped in clause which can hold 128 Alu instructions ; these instructions can access up to 4 prefetched 4 lines of 16 registers from constant buffers. Such ALU clauses are initiated by CF&#95;ALU instructions.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; getAccessedBankLine(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sel)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sel is (512 + (kc&#95;bank &lt;&lt; 12) + ConstIndex) &lt;&lt; 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (See also R600ISelLowering.cpp)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ConstIndex value is in &#91;0, 4095&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ((Sel &gt;&gt; 2) - 512) &gt;&gt; 12, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// KC&#95;BANK</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Line Number of ConstIndex</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A line contains 16 constant registers however KCX bank can lock</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two line at the same time ; thus we want to get an even line number.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Line number can be retrieved with (&gt;&gt;4), using (&gt;&gt;5) &lt;&lt;1 generates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an even number.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ((((Sel &gt;&gt; 2) - 512) &amp; 4095) &gt;&gt; 5) &lt;&lt; 1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> canClauseLocalKillFitInClause(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;&gt; KCacheBanks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> Def,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> BBEnd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/r600registerinfo">R600RegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> = TII-&gt;getRegisterInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//TODO: change this to defs?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : Def-&gt;all&#95;defs()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>.isPhysRegLiveAcrossClauses(MO.getReg()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Def defines a clause local register, so check that its use will fit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the clause.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastUseCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> UseI = Def; UseI != BBEnd; ++UseI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AluInstCount += OccupiedDwords(&#42;UseI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we won&#39;t need to end the clause due to KCache limitations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SubstituteKCacheBank(&#42;UseI, KCacheBanks, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have reached the maximum instruction limit before finding the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use that kills this register, so we cannot use this def in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current clause.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AluInstCount &gt;= TII-&gt;getMaxAlusPerClause())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Is this true? kill flag appears to work OK below</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Register kill flags have been cleared by the time we get to this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass, but it is safe to assume that all uses of this register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occur in the same basic block as its definition, because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is illegal for the scheduler to schedule them in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseI-&gt;readsRegister(MO.getReg(), &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LastUseCount = AluInstCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
